toolUseResult.originalFile:
#!/bin/bash
set -euo pipefail

# OVH Cloud Deployment Script for Manifolded
# Deploys the complete Manifolded platform to OVH Cloud infrastructure

SCRIPT_DIR="$( cd "$( dirname "${BASH_SOURCE[0]}" )" && pwd )"
PROJECT_ROOT="$(dirname "$SCRIPT_DIR")"

# Source environment variables
if [ -f "${PROJECT_ROOT}/.env" ]; then
    source "${PROJECT_ROOT}/.env"
fi

# OVH Configuration
OVH_REGION="${OVH_REGION:-BHS}"
OVH_DATACENTER="${OVH_DATACENTER:-bhs1}"
OVH_REGISTRY="${OVH_REGISTRY:-registry.ovh.net}"
REGISTRY_NAMESPACE="${REGISTRY_NAMESPACE:-manifolded}"

# Deployment Configuration
DEPLOYMENT_ENV="${DEPLOYMENT_ENV:-production}"
NOMAD_ADDR="${NOMAD_ADDR:-https://nomad.manifolded.ovh:4646}"
CONSUL_ADDR="${CONSUL_ADDR:-https://consul.manifolded.ovh:8500}"
VAULT_ADDR="${VAULT_ADDR:-https://vault.manifolded.ovh:8200}"

# Load registry configuration
if [ -f "${PROJECT_ROOT}/.env.registry" ]; then
    source "${PROJECT_ROOT}/.env.registry"
fi

# Container images - Production Split Architecture
# Private images (OVH Registry)
CORE_PRIVATE_IMAGE="${OVH_REGISTRY}/${MANIFOLD_NAMESPACE:-manifolded}/core:${VERSION:-latest}"
SECURITY_IMAGE="${OVH_REGISTRY}/${MANIFOLD_NAMESPACE:-manifolded}/security:${VERSION:-latest}"
SANDBOX_IMAGE="${OVH_REGISTRY}/${MANIFOLD_NAMESPACE:-manifolded}/sandbox:${VERSION:-latest}"
VIMMACS_RUNTIME_IMAGE="${OVH_REGISTRY}/${VIMMACS_NAMESPACE:-vimmacs}/runtime:${VERSION:-latest}"

# Public images (Docker Hub)
CLI_PUBLIC_IMAGE="${PUBLIC_REGISTRY:-docker.io}/${PUBLIC_NAMESPACE:-manifolded}/cli:${VERSION:-latest}"
SDK_IMAGE="${PUBLIC_REGISTRY:-docker.io}/${PUBLIC_NAMESPACE:-manifolded}/sdk:${VERSION:-latest}"
EXAMPLES_IMAGE="${PUBLIC_REGISTRY:-docker.io}/${PUBLIC_NAMESPACE:-manifolded}/examples:${VERSION:-latest}"

# Colors
RED='\033[0;31m'
GREEN='\033[0;32m'
YELLOW='\033[1;33m'
BLUE='\033[0;34m'
NC='\033[0m'

log_info() { echo -e "${GREEN}[INFO]${NC} $1"; }
log_warn() { echo -e "${YELLOW}[WARN]${NC} $1"; }
log_error() { echo -e "${RED}[ERROR]${NC} $1"; }
log_debug() { echo -e "${BLUE}[DEBUG]${NC} $1"; }

# Check prerequisites
check_prerequisites() {
    log_info "Checking deployment prerequisites..."
    
    # Check required tools
    local required_tools=("python3" "nomad" "consul" "vault" "jq" "curl")
    for tool in "${required_tools[@]}"; do
        if ! command -v "$tool" &> /dev/null; then
            log_error "$tool is not installed"
            exit 1
        fi
    done
    
    # Check OVH credentials
    if [ -z "${OVH_APPLICATION_KEY}" ] || [ -z "${OVH_APPLICATION_SECRET}" ] || [ -z "${OVH_CONSUMER_KEY}" ]; then
        log_error "OVH credentials not set. Please export OVH_APPLICATION_KEY, OVH_APPLICATION_SECRET, and OVH_CONSUMER_KEY"
        exit 1
    fi
    
    # Check Nomad connectivity
    if ! nomad status &> /dev/null; then
        log_warn "Cannot connect to Nomad cluster at ${NOMAD_ADDR}"
        log_warn "Attempting to set up Nomad connection..."
        export NOMAD_ADDR="${NOMAD_ADDR}"
        export NOMAD_TOKEN="${NOMAD_TOKEN:-}"
    fi
    
    log_info "Prerequisites check completed"
}

# Deploy infrastructure using Python OVH client
deploy_infrastructure() {
    log_info "Deploying OVH infrastructure..."
    
    python3 "${PROJECT_ROOT}/scripts/ovh_deploy.py" \
        --action deploy \
        --region "${OVH_REGION}" \
        --environment "${DEPLOYMENT_ENV}" \
        --config "${PROJECT_ROOT}/configs/ovh-infrastructure.yaml" || {
        log_error "Infrastructure deployment failed"
        exit 1
    }
    
    log_info "Infrastructure deployed successfully"
}

# Setup HashiCorp Vault for secrets management
setup_vault() {
    log_info "Setting up Vault for secrets management..."
    
    # Initialize Vault if needed
    if ! vault status &> /dev/null; then
        log_info "Initializing Vault..."
        vault operator init -key-shares=5 -key-threshold=3 > "${PROJECT_ROOT}/.vault-keys"
        chmod 600 "${PROJECT_ROOT}/.vault-keys"
        log_warn "Vault keys saved to ${PROJECT_ROOT}/.vault-keys - KEEP THESE SECURE!"
    fi
    
    # Create secrets for production-split architecture
    vault kv put secret/manifolded/production \
        database_url="${DATABASE_URL}" \
        redis_url="${REDIS_URL}" \
        s3_bucket="${S3_BUCKET}" \
        phoenix_secret="${PHOENIX_SECRET_KEY_BASE}" \
        wasm_signing_key="${WASM_SIGNING_KEY}"
    
    # Registry credentials for private and public repositories
    vault kv put secret/manifolded/registry \
        ovh_registry_username="${OVH_REGISTRY_USERNAME}" \
        ovh_registry_password="${OVH_REGISTRY_PASSWORD}" \
        dockerhub_username="${DOCKERHUB_USERNAME:-}" \
        dockerhub_token="${DOCKERHUB_TOKEN:-}"
    
    # Security and sandboxing configuration
    vault kv put secret/manifolded/security \
        sandbox_layers=8 \
        isolation_level="maximum" \
        kata_enabled="true" \
        quantum_wasm_enabled="true" \
        air_gap_enabled="true"
    
    # Create policies for production-split architecture
    vault policy write manifolded-core - <<EOF
path "secret/data/manifolded/production" {
  capabilities = ["read", "list"]
}
path "secret/data/manifolded/registry" {
  capabilities = ["read", "list"]
}
path "secret/data/manifolded/security" {
  capabilities = ["read", "list"]
}
path "auth/token/renew-self" {
  capabilities = ["update"]
}
EOF
    
    # Additional policy for Vimmacs runtime
    vault policy write vimmacs-runtime - <<EOF
path "secret/data/manifolded/registry" {
  capabilities = ["read"]
}
path "secret/data/manifolded/security" {
  capabilities = ["read"]
}
path "auth/token/renew-self" {
  capabilities = ["update"]
}
EOF
    
    log_info "Vault setup completed"
}

# Setup Consul for service discovery
setup_consul() {
    log_info "Setting up Consul service discovery..."
    
    # Register services for production-split architecture
    consul services register - <<EOF
{
  "service": {
    "name": "manifolded-core",
    "tags": ["production", "api", "grpc", "8-layer-sandbox"],
    "port": 50051,
    "check": {
      "grpc": "localhost:50051",
      "interval": "10s"
    }
  }
}
EOF
    
    consul services register - <<EOF
{
  "service": {
    "name": "vimmacs-runtime",
    "tags": ["production", "wasm", "archlinux", "kata"],
    "port": 50052,
    "check": {
      "grpc": "localhost:50052",
      "interval": "15s"
    }
  }
}
EOF
    
    consul services register - <<EOF
{
  "service": {
    "name": "manifolded-security",
    "tags": ["production", "security", "scanner"],
    "port": 8443,
    "check": {
      "https": "https://localhost:8443/health",
      "interval": "30s"
    }
  }
}
EOF
    
    consul services register - <<EOF
{
  "service": {
    "name": "manifolded-phoenix",
    "tags": ["production", "web", "hpqc", "quantum"],
    "port": 4000,
    "check": {
      "http": "http://localhost:4000/health",
      "interval": "10s"
    }
  }
}
EOF
    
    # Set configuration
    consul kv put manifolded/config/production @"${PROJECT_ROOT}/configs/production.yaml"
    
    log_info "Consul setup completed"
}

# Deploy using Nomad
deploy_nomad() {
    log_info "Deploying to Nomad cluster..."
    
    # Validate job file
    nomad job validate "${PROJECT_ROOT}/nomad/manifolded.nomad" || {
        log_error "Nomad job validation failed"
        exit 1
    }
    
    # Plan deployment with production-split images
    log_info "Planning Nomad deployment with production-split architecture..."
    nomad job plan \
        -var="image_core=${CORE_PRIVATE_IMAGE}" \
        -var="image_security=${SECURITY_IMAGE}" \
        -var="image_sandbox=${SANDBOX_IMAGE}" \
        -var="image_vimmacs=${VIMMACS_RUNTIME_IMAGE}" \
        -var="image_cli=${CLI_PUBLIC_IMAGE}" \
        -var="datacenter=${OVH_DATACENTER}" \
        -var="environment=${DEPLOYMENT_ENV}" \
        -var="registry_ovh=${OVH_REGISTRY}" \
        -var="registry_public=${PUBLIC_REGISTRY:-docker.io}" \
        "${PROJECT_ROOT}/nomad/manifolded.nomad"
    
    # Run deployment
    log_info "Running Nomad deployment with 8-layer sandboxing..."
    nomad job run \
        -var="image_core=${CORE_PRIVATE_IMAGE}" \
        -var="image_security=${SECURITY_IMAGE}" \
        -var="image_sandbox=${SANDBOX_IMAGE}" \
        -var="image_vimmacs=${VIMMACS_RUNTIME_IMAGE}" \
        -var="image_cli=${CLI_PUBLIC_IMAGE}" \
        -var="datacenter=${OVH_DATACENTER}" \
        -var="environment=${DEPLOYMENT_ENV}" \
        -var="registry_ovh=${OVH_REGISTRY}" \
        -var="registry_public=${PUBLIC_REGISTRY:-docker.io}" \
        -check-index 0 \
        "${PROJECT_ROOT}/nomad/manifolded.nomad" || {
        log_error "Nomad deployment failed"
        exit 1
    }
    
    # Wait for deployment to be healthy
    log_info "Waiting for deployment to be healthy..."
    local max_attempts=60
    local attempt=0
    
    while [ $attempt -lt $max_attempts ]; do
        if nomad job status manifolded | grep -q "running.*healthy"; then
            log_info "Deployment is healthy"
            break
        fi
        sleep 5
        ((attempt++))
    done
    
    if [ $attempt -eq $max_attempts ]; then
        log_error "Deployment health check timed out"
        exit 1
    fi
    
    log_info "Nomad deployment completed successfully"
}

# Setup monitoring and alerting
setup_monitoring() {
    log_info "Setting up monitoring and alerting..."
    
    # Deploy Prometheus configuration
    consul kv put prometheus/config/manifolded @"${PROJECT_ROOT}/monitoring/prometheus/manifolded-prometheus.yml"
    
    # Deploy Grafana dashboards
    for dashboard in "${PROJECT_ROOT}"/monitoring/grafana/dashboards/*.json; do
        dashboard_name=$(basename "$dashboard" .json)
        consul kv put "grafana/dashboards/${dashboard_name}" @"${dashboard}"
    done
    
    # Setup alerts
    consul kv put alertmanager/config/manifolded @"${PROJECT_ROOT}/monitoring/alertmanager/alertmanager.yml"
    
    log_info "Monitoring setup completed"
}

# Configure load balancer and SSL
setup_load_balancer() {
    log_info "Configuring load balancer and SSL..."
    
    # Use OVH API to configure load balancer
    python3 - <<EOF
import ovh
import os

client = ovh.Client(
    endpoint='ovh-eu',
    application_key=os.environ['OVH_APPLICATION_KEY'],
    application_secret=os.environ['OVH_APPLICATION_SECRET'],
    consumer_key=os.environ['OVH_CONSUMER_KEY']
)

# Configure load balancer
service_name = os.environ['OVH_SERVICE_NAME']
lb_id = os.environ.get('OVH_LOAD_BALANCER_ID')

if lb_id:
    # Add backend servers
    backend_config = {
        'displayName': 'manifolded-production',
        'port': 8080,
        'probe': {
            'url': '/health',
            'interval': 30,
            'method': 'GET'
        }
    }
    
    result = client.post(f'/ipLoadbalancing/{lb_id}/tcp/backend', **backend_config)
    print(f"Load balancer configured: {result}")
EOF
    
    # Setup SSL certificate
    if [ -n "${DOMAIN_NAME}" ]; then
        log_info "Setting up SSL for ${DOMAIN_NAME}..."
        # This would typically use Let's Encrypt or OVH SSL
    fi
    
    log_info "Load balancer setup completed"
}

# Run smoke tests
run_smoke_tests() {
    log_info "Running smoke tests..."
    
    # Test core API
    if curl -f -s "http://${NOMAD_ADDR}/v1/agent/health" > /dev/null; then
        log_info "âœ“ Nomad API is healthy"
    else
        log_error "âœ— Nomad API is not responding"
    fi
    
    # Test Manifolded core
    local core_endpoint=$(consul catalog services | jq -r '.["manifolded-core"][0].ServiceAddress')
    if [ -n "$core_endpoint" ]; then
        if curl -f -s "http://${core_endpoint}:8080/health" > /dev/null; then
            log_info "âœ“ Manifolded Core is healthy"
        else
            log_error "âœ— Manifolded Core is not responding"
        fi
    fi
    
    # Test Phoenix/HPQC endpoint
    local phoenix_endpoint=$(consul catalog services | jq -r '.["manifolded-phoenix"][0].ServiceAddress')
    if [ -n "$phoenix_endpoint" ]; then
        if curl -f -s "http://${phoenix_endpoint}:4000/health" > /dev/null; then
            log_info "âœ“ Phoenix/HPQC is healthy"
        else
            log_warn "âœ— Phoenix/HPQC is not responding"
        fi
    fi
    
    log_info "Smoke tests completed"
}

# Print deployment summary
print_summary() {
    echo
    echo "============================================================"
    echo "           Manifolded Deployment Summary"
    echo "============================================================"
    echo "Environment:        ${DEPLOYMENT_ENV}"
    echo "Region:            ${OVH_REGION}"
    echo "Datacenter:        ${OVH_DATACENTER}"
    echo
    echo "Services:"
    echo "  Nomad:           ${NOMAD_ADDR}"
    echo "  Consul:          ${CONSUL_ADDR}"
    echo "  Vault:           ${VAULT_ADDR}"
    echo
    echo "Container Images:"
    echo "  Core:            ${CORE_IMAGE}"
    echo "  CLI:             ${CLI_IMAGE}"
    echo "  WASM:            ${WASM_IMAGE}"
    echo
    echo "Endpoints:"
    
    # Get service endpoints from Consul
    if command -v consul &> /dev/null; then
        local core_addr=$(consul catalog services | jq -r '.["manifolded-core"][0].ServiceAddress' 2>/dev/null || echo "N/A")
        local phoenix_addr=$(consul catalog services | jq -r '.["manifolded-phoenix"][0].ServiceAddress' 2>/dev/null || echo "N/A")
        echo "  Core API:        ${core_addr}:8080"
        echo "  Phoenix/HPQC:    ${phoenix_addr}:4000"
        echo "  gRPC:            ${core_addr}:50051"
    fi
    
    echo
    echo "Next Steps:"
    echo "  1. Verify deployment: nomad job status manifolded"
    echo "  2. Check logs: nomad alloc logs <alloc-id>"
    echo "  3. Access UI: http://<load-balancer-ip>"
    echo "  4. Test CLI: manifolded --endpoint grpc://<core-ip>:50051 status"
    echo "============================================================"
}

# Main deployment flow
main() {
    log_info "Starting Manifolded deployment to OVH Cloud..."
    
    # Parse arguments
    ACTION="${1:-deploy}"
    
    case "$ACTION" in
        deploy)
            check_prerequisites
            deploy_infrastructure
            setup_vault
            setup_consul
            deploy_nomad
            setup_monitoring
            setup_load_balancer
            run_smoke_tests
            print_summary
            ;;
        update)
            check_prerequisites
            deploy_nomad
            run_smoke_tests
            ;;
        rollback)
            log_info "Rolling back deployment..."
            nomad job revert manifolded 1
            ;;
        status)
            nomad job status manifolded
            consul catalog services
            ;;
        destroy)
            log_warn "Destroying deployment..."
            read -p "Are you sure? (yes/no): " confirm
            if [ "$confirm" = "yes" ]; then
                nomad job stop -purge manifolded
                python3 "${PROJECT_ROOT}/scripts/ovh_deploy.py" --action destroy
            fi
            ;;
        *)
            echo "Usage: $0 [deploy|update|rollback|status|destroy]"
            exit 1
            ;;
    esac
    
    log_info "Deployment operation completed successfully!"
}

# Run main function
main "$@"

#!/bin/bash
set -euo pipefail

# OVH Cloud Deployment Script for Manifolded
# Deploys the complete Manifolded platform to OVH Cloud infrastructure

SCRIPT_DIR="$( cd "$( dirname "${BASH_SOURCE[0]}" )" && pwd )"
PROJECT_ROOT="$(dirname "$SCRIPT_DIR")"

# Source environment variables
if [ -f "${PROJECT_ROOT}/.env" ]; then
    source "${PROJECT_ROOT}/.env"
fi

# OVH Configuration
OVH_REGION="${OVH_REGION:-BHS}"
OVH_DATACENTER="${OVH_DATACENTER:-bhs1}"
OVH_REGISTRY="${OVH_REGISTRY:-registry.ovh.net}"
REGISTRY_NAMESPACE="${REGISTRY_NAMESPACE:-manifolded}"

# Deployment Configuration
DEPLOYMENT_ENV="${DEPLOYMENT_ENV:-production}"
NOMAD_ADDR="${NOMAD_ADDR:-https://nomad.manifolded.ovh:4646}"
CONSUL_ADDR="${CONSUL_ADDR:-https://consul.manifolded.ovh:8500}"
VAULT_ADDR="${VAULT_ADDR:-https://vault.manifolded.ovh:8200}"

# Load registry configuration
if [ -f "${PROJECT_ROOT}/.env.registry" ]; then
    source "${PROJECT_ROOT}/.env.registry"
fi

# Container images - Production Split Architecture
# Private images (OVH Registry)
CORE_PRIVATE_IMAGE="${OVH_REGISTRY}/${MANIFOLD_NAMESPACE:-manifolded}/core:${VERSION:-latest}"
SECURITY_IMAGE="${OVH_REGISTRY}/${MANIFOLD_NAMESPACE:-manifolded}/security:${VERSION:-latest}"
SANDBOX_IMAGE="${OVH_REGISTRY}/${MANIFOLD_NAMESPACE:-manifolded}/sandbox:${VERSION:-latest}"
VIMMACS_RUNTIME_IMAGE="${OVH_REGISTRY}/${VIMMACS_NAMESPACE:-vimmacs}/runtime:${VERSION:-latest}"

# Public images (Docker Hub)
CLI_PUBLIC_IMAGE="${PUBLIC_REGISTRY:-docker.io}/${PUBLIC_NAMESPACE:-manifolded}/cli:${VERSION:-latest}"
SDK_IMAGE="${PUBLIC_REGISTRY:-docker.io}/${PUBLIC_NAMESPACE:-manifolded}/sdk:${VERSION:-latest}"
EXAMPLES_IMAGE="${PUBLIC_REGISTRY:-docker.io}/${PUBLIC_NAMESPACE:-manifolded}/examples:${VERSION:-latest}"

# Colors
RED='\033[0;31m'
GREEN='\033[0;32m'
YELLOW='\033[1;33m'
BLUE='\033[0;34m'
NC='\033[0m'

log_info() { echo -e "${GREEN}[INFO]${NC} $1"; }
log_warn() { echo -e "${YELLOW}[WARN]${NC} $1"; }
log_error() { echo -e "${RED}[ERROR]${NC} $1"; }
log_debug() { echo -e "${BLUE}[DEBUG]${NC} $1"; }

# Check prerequisites
check_prerequisites() {
    log_info "Checking deployment prerequisites..."
    
    # Check required tools
    local required_tools=("python3" "nomad" "consul" "vault" "jq" "curl")
    for tool in "${required_tools[@]}"; do
        if ! command -v "$tool" &> /dev/null; then
            log_error "$tool is not installed"
            exit 1
        fi
    done
    
    # Check OVH credentials
    if [ -z "${OVH_APPLICATION_KEY}" ] || [ -z "${OVH_APPLICATION_SECRET}" ] || [ -z "${OVH_CONSUMER_KEY}" ]; then
        log_error "OVH credentials not set. Please export OVH_APPLICATION_KEY, OVH_APPLICATION_SECRET, and OVH_CONSUMER_KEY"
        exit 1
    fi
    
    # Check Nomad connectivity
    if ! nomad status &> /dev/null; then
        log_warn "Cannot connect to Nomad cluster at ${NOMAD_ADDR}"
        log_warn "Attempting to set up Nomad connection..."
        export NOMAD_ADDR="${NOMAD_ADDR}"
        export NOMAD_TOKEN="${NOMAD_TOKEN:-}"
    fi
    
    log_info "Prerequisites check completed"
}

# Deploy infrastructure using Python OVH client
deploy_infrastructure() {
    log_info "Deploying OVH infrastructure..."
    
    python3 "${PROJECT_ROOT}/scripts/ovh_deploy.py" \
        --action deploy \
        --region "${OVH_REGION}" \
        --environment "${DEPLOYMENT_ENV}" \
        --config "${PROJECT_ROOT}/configs/ovh-infrastructure.yaml" || {
        log_error "Infrastructure deployment failed"
        exit 1
    }
    
    log_info "Infrastructure deployed successfully"
}

# Setup HashiCorp Vault for secrets management
setup_vault() {
    log_info "Setting up Vault for secrets management..."
    
    # Initialize Vault if needed
    if ! vault status &> /dev/null; then
        log_info "Initializing Vault..."
        vault operator init -key-shares=5 -key-threshold=3 > "${PROJECT_ROOT}/.vault-keys"
        chmod 600 "${PROJECT_ROOT}/.vault-keys"
        log_warn "Vault keys saved to ${PROJECT_ROOT}/.vault-keys - KEEP THESE SECURE!"
    fi
    
    # Create secrets for production-split architecture
    vault kv put secret/manifolded/production \
        database_url="${DATABASE_URL}" \
        redis_url="${REDIS_URL}" \
        s3_bucket="${S3_BUCKET}" \
        phoenix_secret="${PHOENIX_SECRET_KEY_BASE}" \
        wasm_signing_key="${WASM_SIGNING_KEY}"
    
    # Registry credentials for private and public repositories
    vault kv put secret/manifolded/registry \
        ovh_registry_username="${OVH_REGISTRY_USERNAME}" \
        ovh_registry_password="${OVH_REGISTRY_PASSWORD}" \
        dockerhub_username="${DOCKERHUB_USERNAME:-}" \
        dockerhub_token="${DOCKERHUB_TOKEN:-}"
    
    # Security and sandboxing configuration
    vault kv put secret/manifolded/security \
        sandbox_layers=8 \
        isolation_level="maximum" \
        kata_enabled="true" \
        quantum_wasm_enabled="true" \
        air_gap_enabled="true"
    
    # Create policies for production-split architecture
    vault policy write manifolded-core - <<EOF
path "secret/data/manifolded/production" {
  capabilities = ["read", "list"]
}
path "secret/data/manifolded/registry" {
  capabilities = ["read", "list"]
}
path "secret/data/manifolded/security" {
  capabilities = ["read", "list"]
}
path "auth/token/renew-self" {
  capabilities = ["update"]
}
EOF
    
    # Additional policy for Vimmacs runtime
    vault policy write vimmacs-runtime - <<EOF
path "secret/data/manifolded/registry" {
  capabilities = ["read"]
}
path "secret/data/manifolded/security" {
  capabilities = ["read"]
}
path "auth/token/renew-self" {
  capabilities = ["update"]
}
EOF
    
    log_info "Vault setup completed"
}

# Setup Consul for service discovery
setup_consul() {
    log_info "Setting up Consul service discovery..."
    
    # Register services for production-split architecture
    consul services register - <<EOF
{
  "service": {
    "name": "manifolded-core",
    "tags": ["production", "api", "grpc", "8-layer-sandbox"],
    "port": 50051,
    "check": {
      "grpc": "localhost:50051",
      "interval": "10s"
    }
  }
}
EOF
    
    consul services register - <<EOF
{
  "service": {
    "name": "vimmacs-runtime",
    "tags": ["production", "wasm", "archlinux", "kata"],
    "port": 50052,
    "check": {
      "grpc": "localhost:50052",
      "interval": "15s"
    }
  }
}
EOF
    
    consul services register - <<EOF
{
  "service": {
    "name": "manifolded-security",
    "tags": ["production", "security", "scanner"],
    "port": 8443,
    "check": {
      "https": "https://localhost:8443/health",
      "interval": "30s"
    }
  }
}
EOF
    
    consul services register - <<EOF
{
  "service": {
    "name": "manifolded-phoenix",
    "tags": ["production", "web", "hpqc", "quantum"],
    "port": 4000,
    "check": {
      "http": "http://localhost:4000/health",
      "interval": "10s"
    }
  }
}
EOF
    
    # Set configuration
    consul kv put manifolded/config/production @"${PROJECT_ROOT}/configs/production.yaml"
    
    log_info "Consul setup completed"
}

# Deploy using Nomad
deploy_nomad() {
    log_info "Deploying to Nomad cluster..."
    
    # Validate job file
    nomad job validate "${PROJECT_ROOT}/nomad/manifolded.nomad" || {
        log_error "Nomad job validation failed"
        exit 1
    }
    
    # Plan deployment with production-split images
    log_info "Planning Nomad deployment with production-split architecture..."
    nomad job plan \
        -var="image_core=${CORE_PRIVATE_IMAGE}" \
        -var="image_security=${SECURITY_IMAGE}" \
        -var="image_sandbox=${SANDBOX_IMAGE}" \
        -var="image_vimmacs=${VIMMACS_RUNTIME_IMAGE}" \
        -var="image_cli=${CLI_PUBLIC_IMAGE}" \
        -var="datacenter=${OVH_DATACENTER}" \
        -var="environment=${DEPLOYMENT_ENV}" \
        -var="registry_ovh=${OVH_REGISTRY}" \
        -var="registry_public=${PUBLIC_REGISTRY:-docker.io}" \
        "${PROJECT_ROOT}/nomad/manifolded.nomad"
    
    # Run deployment
    log_info "Running Nomad deployment with 8-layer sandboxing..."
    nomad job run \
        -var="image_core=${CORE_PRIVATE_IMAGE}" \
        -var="image_security=${SECURITY_IMAGE}" \
        -var="image_sandbox=${SANDBOX_IMAGE}" \
        -var="image_vimmacs=${VIMMACS_RUNTIME_IMAGE}" \
        -var="image_cli=${CLI_PUBLIC_IMAGE}" \
        -var="datacenter=${OVH_DATACENTER}" \
        -var="environment=${DEPLOYMENT_ENV}" \
        -var="registry_ovh=${OVH_REGISTRY}" \
        -var="registry_public=${PUBLIC_REGISTRY:-docker.io}" \
        -check-index 0 \
        "${PROJECT_ROOT}/nomad/manifolded.nomad" || {
        log_error "Nomad deployment failed"
        exit 1
    }
    
    # Wait for deployment to be healthy
    log_info "Waiting for deployment to be healthy..."
    local max_attempts=60
    local attempt=0
    
    while [ $attempt -lt $max_attempts ]; do
        if nomad job status manifolded | grep -q "running.*healthy"; then
            log_info "Deployment is healthy"
            break
        fi
        sleep 5
        ((attempt++))
    done
    
    if [ $attempt -eq $max_attempts ]; then
        log_error "Deployment health check timed out"
        exit 1
    fi
    
    log_info "Nomad deployment completed successfully"
}

# Setup monitoring and alerting
setup_monitoring() {
    log_info "Setting up monitoring and alerting..."
    
    # Deploy Prometheus configuration
    consul kv put prometheus/config/manifolded @"${PROJECT_ROOT}/monitoring/prometheus/manifolded-prometheus.yml"
    
    # Deploy Grafana dashboards
    for dashboard in "${PROJECT_ROOT}"/monitoring/grafana/dashboards/*.json; do
        dashboard_name=$(basename "$dashboard" .json)
        consul kv put "grafana/dashboards/${dashboard_name}" @"${dashboard}"
    done
    
    # Setup alerts
    consul kv put alertmanager/config/manifolded @"${PROJECT_ROOT}/monitoring/alertmanager/alertmanager.yml"
    
    log_info "Monitoring setup completed"
}

# Configure load balancer and SSL
setup_load_balancer() {
    log_info "Configuring load balancer and SSL..."
    
    # Use OVH API to configure load balancer
    python3 - <<EOF
import ovh
import os

client = ovh.Client(
    endpoint='ovh-eu',
    application_key=os.environ['OVH_APPLICATION_KEY'],
    application_secret=os.environ['OVH_APPLICATION_SECRET'],
    consumer_key=os.environ['OVH_CONSUMER_KEY']
)

# Configure load balancer
service_name = os.environ['OVH_SERVICE_NAME']
lb_id = os.environ.get('OVH_LOAD_BALANCER_ID')

if lb_id:
    # Add backend servers
    backend_config = {
        'displayName': 'manifolded-production',
        'port': 8080,
        'probe': {
            'url': '/health',
            'interval': 30,
            'method': 'GET'
        }
    }
    
    result = client.post(f'/ipLoadbalancing/{lb_id}/tcp/backend', **backend_config)
    print(f"Load balancer configured: {result}")
EOF
    
    # Setup SSL certificate
    if [ -n "${DOMAIN_NAME}" ]; then
        log_info "Setting up SSL for ${DOMAIN_NAME}..."
        # This would typically use Let's Encrypt or OVH SSL
    fi
    
    log_info "Load balancer setup completed"
}

# Run smoke tests
run_smoke_tests() {
    log_info "Running smoke tests..."
    
    # Test core API
    if curl -f -s "http://${NOMAD_ADDR}/v1/agent/health" > /dev/null; then
        log_info "âœ“ Nomad API is healthy"
    else
        log_error "âœ— Nomad API is not responding"
    fi
    
    # Test Manifolded core (8-layer sandboxing)
    local core_endpoint=$(consul catalog service manifolded-core -format=json 2>/dev/null | jq -r '.[0].ServiceAddress' || echo "")
    if [ -n "$core_endpoint" ] && [ "$core_endpoint" != "null" ]; then
        if grpcurl -plaintext "${core_endpoint}:50051" health.Health/Check &> /dev/null; then
            log_info "âœ“ Manifolded Core (8-layer sandbox) is healthy"
        else
            log_error "âœ— Manifolded Core is not responding on gRPC"
        fi
    fi
    
    # Test Vimmacs WebAssembly runtime
    local vimmacs_endpoint=$(consul catalog service vimmacs-runtime -format=json 2>/dev/null | jq -r '.[0].ServiceAddress' || echo "")
    if [ -n "$vimmacs_endpoint" ] && [ "$vimmacs_endpoint" != "null" ]; then
        if grpcurl -plaintext "${vimmacs_endpoint}:50052" health.Health/Check &> /dev/null; then
            log_info "âœ“ Vimmacs WebAssembly Runtime is healthy"
        else
            log_warn "âœ— Vimmacs Runtime is not responding on gRPC"
        fi
    fi
    
    # Test Security services
    local security_endpoint=$(consul catalog service manifolded-security -format=json 2>/dev/null | jq -r '.[0].ServiceAddress' || echo "")
    if [ -n "$security_endpoint" ] && [ "$security_endpoint" != "null" ]; then
        if curl -k -f -s "https://${security_endpoint}:8443/health" > /dev/null; then
            log_info "âœ“ Manifolded Security Scanner is healthy"
        else
            log_warn "âœ— Security Scanner is not responding"
        fi
    fi
    
    # Test Phoenix/HPQC endpoint
    local phoenix_endpoint=$(consul catalog service manifolded-phoenix -format=json 2>/dev/null | jq -r '.[0].ServiceAddress' || echo "")
    if [ -n "$phoenix_endpoint" ] && [ "$phoenix_endpoint" != "null" ]; then
        if curl -f -s "http://${phoenix_endpoint}:4000/health" > /dev/null; then
            log_info "âœ“ Phoenix/HPQC (Quantum Computing) is healthy"
        else
            log_warn "âœ— Phoenix/HPQC is not responding"
        fi
    fi
    
    log_info "Smoke tests completed"
}

# Print deployment summary
print_summary() {
    echo
    echo "============================================================"
    echo "           Manifolded Deployment Summary"
    echo "============================================================"
    echo "Environment:        ${DEPLOYMENT_ENV}"
    echo "Region:            ${OVH_REGION}"
    echo "Datacenter:        ${OVH_DATACENTER}"
    echo
    echo "Services:"
    echo "  Nomad:           ${NOMAD_ADDR}"
    echo "  Consul:          ${CONSUL_ADDR}"
    echo "  Vault:           ${VAULT_ADDR}"
    echo
    echo "Container Images:"
    echo "  Core:            ${CORE_IMAGE}"
    echo "  CLI:             ${CLI_IMAGE}"
    echo "  WASM:            ${WASM_IMAGE}"
    echo
    echo "Endpoints:"
    
    # Get service endpoints from Consul
    if command -v consul &> /dev/null; then
        local core_addr=$(consul catalog services | jq -r '.["manifolded-core"][0].ServiceAddress' 2>/dev/null || echo "N/A")
        local phoenix_addr=$(consul catalog services | jq -r '.["manifolded-phoenix"][0].ServiceAddress' 2>/dev/null || echo "N/A")
        echo "  Core API:        ${core_addr}:8080"
        echo "  Phoenix/HPQC:    ${phoenix_addr}:4000"
        echo "  gRPC:            ${core_addr}:50051"
    fi
    
    echo
    echo "Next Steps:"
    echo "  1. Verify deployment: nomad job status manifolded"
    echo "  2. Check logs: nomad alloc logs <alloc-id>"
    echo "  3. Access UI: http://<load-balancer-ip>"
    echo "  4. Test CLI: manifolded --endpoint grpc://<core-ip>:50051 status"
    echo "============================================================"
}

# Main deployment flow
main() {
    log_info "Starting Manifolded deployment to OVH Cloud..."
    
    # Parse arguments
    ACTION="${1:-deploy}"
    
    case "$ACTION" in
        deploy)
            check_prerequisites
            deploy_infrastructure
            setup_vault
            setup_consul
            deploy_nomad
            setup_monitoring
            setup_load_balancer
            run_smoke_tests
            print_summary
            ;;
        update)
            check_prerequisites
            deploy_nomad
            run_smoke_tests
            ;;
        rollback)
            log_info "Rolling back deployment..."
            nomad job revert manifolded 1
            ;;
        status)
            nomad job status manifolded
            consul catalog services
            ;;
        destroy)
            log_warn "Destroying deployment..."
            read -p "Are you sure? (yes/no): " confirm
            if [ "$confirm" = "yes" ]; then
                nomad job stop -purge manifolded
                python3 "${PROJECT_ROOT}/scripts/ovh_deploy.py" --action destroy
            fi
            ;;
        *)
            echo "Usage: $0 [deploy|update|rollback|status|destroy]"
            exit 1
            ;;
    esac
    
    log_info "Deployment operation completed successfully!"
}

# Run main function
main "$@"

#!/bin/bash
set -euo pipefail

# OVH Cloud Deployment Script for Manifolded
# Deploys the complete Manifolded platform to OVH Cloud infrastructure

SCRIPT_DIR="$( cd "$( dirname "${BASH_SOURCE[0]}" )" && pwd )"
PROJECT_ROOT="$(dirname "$SCRIPT_DIR")"

# Source environment variables
if [ -f "${PROJECT_ROOT}/.env" ]; then
    source "${PROJECT_ROOT}/.env"
fi

# OVH Configuration
OVH_REGION="${OVH_REGION:-BHS}"
OVH_DATACENTER="${OVH_DATACENTER:-bhs1}"
OVH_REGISTRY="${OVH_REGISTRY:-registry.ovh.net}"
REGISTRY_NAMESPACE="${REGISTRY_NAMESPACE:-manifolded}"

# Deployment Configuration
DEPLOYMENT_ENV="${DEPLOYMENT_ENV:-production}"
NOMAD_ADDR="${NOMAD_ADDR:-https://nomad.manifolded.ovh:4646}"
CONSUL_ADDR="${CONSUL_ADDR:-https://consul.manifolded.ovh:8500}"
VAULT_ADDR="${VAULT_ADDR:-https://vault.manifolded.ovh:8200}"

# Load registry configuration
if [ -f "${PROJECT_ROOT}/.env.registry" ]; then
    source "${PROJECT_ROOT}/.env.registry"
fi

# Container images - Production Split Architecture
# Private images (OVH Registry)
CORE_PRIVATE_IMAGE="${OVH_REGISTRY}/${MANIFOLD_NAMESPACE:-manifolded}/core:${VERSION:-latest}"
SECURITY_IMAGE="${OVH_REGISTRY}/${MANIFOLD_NAMESPACE:-manifolded}/security:${VERSION:-latest}"
SANDBOX_IMAGE="${OVH_REGISTRY}/${MANIFOLD_NAMESPACE:-manifolded}/sandbox:${VERSION:-latest}"
VIMMACS_RUNTIME_IMAGE="${OVH_REGISTRY}/${VIMMACS_NAMESPACE:-vimmacs}/runtime:${VERSION:-latest}"

# Public images (Docker Hub)
CLI_PUBLIC_IMAGE="${PUBLIC_REGISTRY:-docker.io}/${PUBLIC_NAMESPACE:-manifolded}/cli:${VERSION:-latest}"
SDK_IMAGE="${PUBLIC_REGISTRY:-docker.io}/${PUBLIC_NAMESPACE:-manifolded}/sdk:${VERSION:-latest}"
EXAMPLES_IMAGE="${PUBLIC_REGISTRY:-docker.io}/${PUBLIC_NAMESPACE:-manifolded}/examples:${VERSION:-latest}"

# Colors
RED='\033[0;31m'
GREEN='\033[0;32m'
YELLOW='\033[1;33m'
BLUE='\033[0;34m'
NC='\033[0m'

log_info() { echo -e "${GREEN}[INFO]${NC} $1"; }
log_warn() { echo -e "${YELLOW}[WARN]${NC} $1"; }
log_error() { echo -e "${RED}[ERROR]${NC} $1"; }
log_debug() { echo -e "${BLUE}[DEBUG]${NC} $1"; }

# Check prerequisites
check_prerequisites() {
    log_info "Checking deployment prerequisites..."
    
    # Check required tools
    local required_tools=("python3" "nomad" "consul" "vault" "jq" "curl")
    for tool in "${required_tools[@]}"; do
        if ! command -v "$tool" &> /dev/null; then
            log_error "$tool is not installed"
            exit 1
        fi
    done
    
    # Check OVH credentials
    if [ -z "${OVH_APPLICATION_KEY}" ] || [ -z "${OVH_APPLICATION_SECRET}" ] || [ -z "${OVH_CONSUMER_KEY}" ]; then
        log_error "OVH credentials not set. Please export OVH_APPLICATION_KEY, OVH_APPLICATION_SECRET, and OVH_CONSUMER_KEY"
        exit 1
    fi
    
    # Check Nomad connectivity
    if ! nomad status &> /dev/null; then
        log_warn "Cannot connect to Nomad cluster at ${NOMAD_ADDR}"
        log_warn "Attempting to set up Nomad connection..."
        export NOMAD_ADDR="${NOMAD_ADDR}"
        export NOMAD_TOKEN="${NOMAD_TOKEN:-}"
    fi
    
    log_info "Prerequisites check completed"
}

# Deploy infrastructure using Python OVH client
deploy_infrastructure() {
    log_info "Deploying OVH infrastructure..."
    
    python3 "${PROJECT_ROOT}/scripts/ovh_deploy.py" \
        --action deploy \
        --region "${OVH_REGION}" \
        --environment "${DEPLOYMENT_ENV}" \
        --config "${PROJECT_ROOT}/configs/ovh-infrastructure.yaml" || {
        log_error "Infrastructure deployment failed"
        exit 1
    }
    
    log_info "Infrastructure deployed successfully"
}

# Setup HashiCorp Vault for secrets management
setup_vault() {
    log_info "Setting up Vault for secrets management..."
    
    # Initialize Vault if needed
    if ! vault status &> /dev/null; then
        log_info "Initializing Vault..."
        vault operator init -key-shares=5 -key-threshold=3 > "${PROJECT_ROOT}/.vault-keys"
        chmod 600 "${PROJECT_ROOT}/.vault-keys"
        log_warn "Vault keys saved to ${PROJECT_ROOT}/.vault-keys - KEEP THESE SECURE!"
    fi
    
    # Create secrets for production-split architecture
    vault kv put secret/manifolded/production \
        database_url="${DATABASE_URL}" \
        redis_url="${REDIS_URL}" \
        s3_bucket="${S3_BUCKET}" \
        phoenix_secret="${PHOENIX_SECRET_KEY_BASE}" \
        wasm_signing_key="${WASM_SIGNING_KEY}"
    
    # Registry credentials for private and public repositories
    vault kv put secret/manifolded/registry \
        ovh_registry_username="${OVH_REGISTRY_USERNAME}" \
        ovh_registry_password="${OVH_REGISTRY_PASSWORD}" \
        dockerhub_username="${DOCKERHUB_USERNAME:-}" \
        dockerhub_token="${DOCKERHUB_TOKEN:-}"
    
    # Security and sandboxing configuration
    vault kv put secret/manifolded/security \
        sandbox_layers=8 \
        isolation_level="maximum" \
        kata_enabled="true" \
        quantum_wasm_enabled="true" \
        air_gap_enabled="true"
    
    # Create policies for production-split architecture
    vault policy write manifolded-core - <<EOF
path "secret/data/manifolded/production" {
  capabilities = ["read", "list"]
}
path "secret/data/manifolded/registry" {
  capabilities = ["read", "list"]
}
path "secret/data/manifolded/security" {
  capabilities = ["read", "list"]
}
path "auth/token/renew-self" {
  capabilities = ["update"]
}
EOF
    
    # Additional policy for Vimmacs runtime
    vault policy write vimmacs-runtime - <<EOF
path "secret/data/manifolded/registry" {
  capabilities = ["read"]
}
path "secret/data/manifolded/security" {
  capabilities = ["read"]
}
path "auth/token/renew-self" {
  capabilities = ["update"]
}
EOF
    
    log_info "Vault setup completed"
}

# Setup Consul for service discovery
setup_consul() {
    log_info "Setting up Consul service discovery..."
    
    # Register services for production-split architecture
    consul services register - <<EOF
{
  "service": {
    "name": "manifolded-core",
    "tags": ["production", "api", "grpc", "8-layer-sandbox"],
    "port": 50051,
    "check": {
      "grpc": "localhost:50051",
      "interval": "10s"
    }
  }
}
EOF
    
    consul services register - <<EOF
{
  "service": {
    "name": "vimmacs-runtime",
    "tags": ["production", "wasm", "archlinux", "kata"],
    "port": 50052,
    "check": {
      "grpc": "localhost:50052",
      "interval": "15s"
    }
  }
}
EOF
    
    consul services register - <<EOF
{
  "service": {
    "name": "manifolded-security",
    "tags": ["production", "security", "scanner"],
    "port": 8443,
    "check": {
      "https": "https://localhost:8443/health",
      "interval": "30s"
    }
  }
}
EOF
    
    consul services register - <<EOF
{
  "service": {
    "name": "manifolded-phoenix",
    "tags": ["production", "web", "hpqc", "quantum"],
    "port": 4000,
    "check": {
      "http": "http://localhost:4000/health",
      "interval": "10s"
    }
  }
}
EOF
    
    # Set configuration
    consul kv put manifolded/config/production @"${PROJECT_ROOT}/configs/production.yaml"
    
    log_info "Consul setup completed"
}

# Deploy using Nomad
deploy_nomad() {
    log_info "Deploying to Nomad cluster..."
    
    # Validate job file
    nomad job validate "${PROJECT_ROOT}/nomad/manifolded.nomad" || {
        log_error "Nomad job validation failed"
        exit 1
    }
    
    # Plan deployment with production-split images
    log_info "Planning Nomad deployment with production-split architecture..."
    nomad job plan \
        -var="image_core=${CORE_PRIVATE_IMAGE}" \
        -var="image_security=${SECURITY_IMAGE}" \
        -var="image_sandbox=${SANDBOX_IMAGE}" \
        -var="image_vimmacs=${VIMMACS_RUNTIME_IMAGE}" \
        -var="image_cli=${CLI_PUBLIC_IMAGE}" \
        -var="datacenter=${OVH_DATACENTER}" \
        -var="environment=${DEPLOYMENT_ENV}" \
        -var="registry_ovh=${OVH_REGISTRY}" \
        -var="registry_public=${PUBLIC_REGISTRY:-docker.io}" \
        "${PROJECT_ROOT}/nomad/manifolded.nomad"
    
    # Run deployment
    log_info "Running Nomad deployment with 8-layer sandboxing..."
    nomad job run \
        -var="image_core=${CORE_PRIVATE_IMAGE}" \
        -var="image_security=${SECURITY_IMAGE}" \
        -var="image_sandbox=${SANDBOX_IMAGE}" \
        -var="image_vimmacs=${VIMMACS_RUNTIME_IMAGE}" \
        -var="image_cli=${CLI_PUBLIC_IMAGE}" \
        -var="datacenter=${OVH_DATACENTER}" \
        -var="environment=${DEPLOYMENT_ENV}" \
        -var="registry_ovh=${OVH_REGISTRY}" \
        -var="registry_public=${PUBLIC_REGISTRY:-docker.io}" \
        -check-index 0 \
        "${PROJECT_ROOT}/nomad/manifolded.nomad" || {
        log_error "Nomad deployment failed"
        exit 1
    }
    
    # Wait for deployment to be healthy
    log_info "Waiting for deployment to be healthy..."
    local max_attempts=60
    local attempt=0
    
    while [ $attempt -lt $max_attempts ]; do
        if nomad job status manifolded | grep -q "running.*healthy"; then
            log_info "Deployment is healthy"
            break
        fi
        sleep 5
        ((attempt++))
    done
    
    if [ $attempt -eq $max_attempts ]; then
        log_error "Deployment health check timed out"
        exit 1
    fi
    
    log_info "Nomad deployment completed successfully"
}

# Setup monitoring and alerting
setup_monitoring() {
    log_info "Setting up monitoring and alerting..."
    
    # Deploy Prometheus configuration
    consul kv put prometheus/config/manifolded @"${PROJECT_ROOT}/monitoring/prometheus/manifolded-prometheus.yml"
    
    # Deploy Grafana dashboards
    for dashboard in "${PROJECT_ROOT}"/monitoring/grafana/dashboards/*.json; do
        dashboard_name=$(basename "$dashboard" .json)
        consul kv put "grafana/dashboards/${dashboard_name}" @"${dashboard}"
    done
    
    # Setup alerts
    consul kv put alertmanager/config/manifolded @"${PROJECT_ROOT}/monitoring/alertmanager/alertmanager.yml"
    
    log_info "Monitoring setup completed"
}

# Configure load balancer and SSL
setup_load_balancer() {
    log_info "Configuring load balancer and SSL..."
    
    # Use OVH API to configure load balancer
    python3 - <<EOF
import ovh
import os

client = ovh.Client(
    endpoint='ovh-eu',
    application_key=os.environ['OVH_APPLICATION_KEY'],
    application_secret=os.environ['OVH_APPLICATION_SECRET'],
    consumer_key=os.environ['OVH_CONSUMER_KEY']
)

# Configure load balancer
service_name = os.environ['OVH_SERVICE_NAME']
lb_id = os.environ.get('OVH_LOAD_BALANCER_ID')

if lb_id:
    # Add backend servers
    backend_config = {
        'displayName': 'manifolded-production',
        'port': 8080,
        'probe': {
            'url': '/health',
            'interval': 30,
            'method': 'GET'
        }
    }
    
    result = client.post(f'/ipLoadbalancing/{lb_id}/tcp/backend', **backend_config)
    print(f"Load balancer configured: {result}")
EOF
    
    # Setup SSL certificate
    if [ -n "${DOMAIN_NAME}" ]; then
        log_info "Setting up SSL for ${DOMAIN_NAME}..."
        # This would typically use Let's Encrypt or OVH SSL
    fi
    
    log_info "Load balancer setup completed"
}

# Run smoke tests
run_smoke_tests() {
    log_info "Running smoke tests..."
    
    # Test core API
    if curl -f -s "http://${NOMAD_ADDR}/v1/agent/health" > /dev/null; then
        log_info "âœ“ Nomad API is healthy"
    else
        log_error "âœ— Nomad API is not responding"
    fi
    
    # Test Manifolded core (8-layer sandboxing)
    local core_endpoint=$(consul catalog service manifolded-core -format=json 2>/dev/null | jq -r '.[0].ServiceAddress' || echo "")
    if [ -n "$core_endpoint" ] && [ "$core_endpoint" != "null" ]; then
        if grpcurl -plaintext "${core_endpoint}:50051" health.Health/Check &> /dev/null; then
            log_info "âœ“ Manifolded Core (8-layer sandbox) is healthy"
        else
            log_error "âœ— Manifolded Core is not responding on gRPC"
        fi
    fi
    
    # Test Vimmacs WebAssembly runtime
    local vimmacs_endpoint=$(consul catalog service vimmacs-runtime -format=json 2>/dev/null | jq -r '.[0].ServiceAddress' || echo "")
    if [ -n "$vimmacs_endpoint" ] && [ "$vimmacs_endpoint" != "null" ]; then
        if grpcurl -plaintext "${vimmacs_endpoint}:50052" health.Health/Check &> /dev/null; then
            log_info "âœ“ Vimmacs WebAssembly Runtime is healthy"
        else
            log_warn "âœ— Vimmacs Runtime is not responding on gRPC"
        fi
    fi
    
    # Test Security services
    local security_endpoint=$(consul catalog service manifolded-security -format=json 2>/dev/null | jq -r '.[0].ServiceAddress' || echo "")
    if [ -n "$security_endpoint" ] && [ "$security_endpoint" != "null" ]; then
        if curl -k -f -s "https://${security_endpoint}:8443/health" > /dev/null; then
            log_info "âœ“ Manifolded Security Scanner is healthy"
        else
            log_warn "âœ— Security Scanner is not responding"
        fi
    fi
    
    # Test Phoenix/HPQC endpoint
    local phoenix_endpoint=$(consul catalog service manifolded-phoenix -format=json 2>/dev/null | jq -r '.[0].ServiceAddress' || echo "")
    if [ -n "$phoenix_endpoint" ] && [ "$phoenix_endpoint" != "null" ]; then
        if curl -f -s "http://${phoenix_endpoint}:4000/health" > /dev/null; then
            log_info "âœ“ Phoenix/HPQC (Quantum Computing) is healthy"
        else
            log_warn "âœ— Phoenix/HPQC is not responding"
        fi
    fi
    
    log_info "Smoke tests completed"
}

# Print deployment summary
print_summary() {
    echo
    echo "============================================================"
    echo "         Manifolded Production-Split Deployment"
    echo "============================================================"
    echo "Environment:        ${DEPLOYMENT_ENV}"
    echo "Region:            ${OVH_REGION}"
    echo "Datacenter:        ${OVH_DATACENTER}"
    echo "Architecture:      Production-Split (Private/Public)"
    echo "Sandboxing:        8-Layer Maximum Security"
    echo
    echo "Services:"
    echo "  Nomad:           ${NOMAD_ADDR}"
    echo "  Consul:          ${CONSUL_ADDR}"
    echo "  Vault:           ${VAULT_ADDR}"
    echo
    echo "Private Images (OVH Registry):"
    echo "  Core:            ${CORE_PRIVATE_IMAGE}"
    echo "  Security:        ${SECURITY_IMAGE}"
    echo "  Sandbox:         ${SANDBOX_IMAGE}"
    echo "  Vimmacs Runtime: ${VIMMACS_RUNTIME_IMAGE}"
    echo
    echo "Public Images (Docker Hub):"
    echo "  CLI:             ${CLI_PUBLIC_IMAGE}"
    echo "  SDK:             ${SDK_IMAGE}"
    echo "  Examples:        ${EXAMPLES_IMAGE}"
    echo
    echo "Endpoints:"
    
    # Get service endpoints from Consul
    if command -v consul &> /dev/null; then
        local core_addr=$(consul catalog services | jq -r '.["manifolded-core"][0].ServiceAddress' 2>/dev/null || echo "N/A")
        local phoenix_addr=$(consul catalog services | jq -r '.["manifolded-phoenix"][0].ServiceAddress' 2>/dev/null || echo "N/A")
        echo "  Core API:        ${core_addr}:8080"
        echo "  Phoenix/HPQC:    ${phoenix_addr}:4000"
        echo "  gRPC:            ${core_addr}:50051"
    fi
    
    echo
    echo "Next Steps:"
    echo "  1. Verify deployment: nomad job status manifolded"
    echo "  2. Check logs: nomad alloc logs <alloc-id>"
    echo "  3. Access UI: http://<load-balancer-ip>"
    echo "  4. Test CLI: manifolded --endpoint grpc://<core-ip>:50051 status"
    echo "============================================================"
}

# Main deployment flow
main() {
    log_info "Starting Manifolded deployment to OVH Cloud..."
    
    # Parse arguments
    ACTION="${1:-deploy}"
    
    case "$ACTION" in
        deploy)
            check_prerequisites
            deploy_infrastructure
            setup_vault
            setup_consul
            deploy_nomad
            setup_monitoring
            setup_load_balancer
            run_smoke_tests
            print_summary
            ;;
        update)
            check_prerequisites
            deploy_nomad
            run_smoke_tests
            ;;
        rollback)
            log_info "Rolling back deployment..."
            nomad job revert manifolded 1
            ;;
        status)
            nomad job status manifolded
            consul catalog services
            ;;
        destroy)
            log_warn "Destroying deployment..."
            read -p "Are you sure? (yes/no): " confirm
            if [ "$confirm" = "yes" ]; then
                nomad job stop -purge manifolded
                python3 "${PROJECT_ROOT}/scripts/ovh_deploy.py" --action destroy
            fi
            ;;
        *)
            echo "Usage: $0 [deploy|update|rollback|status|destroy]"
            exit 1
            ;;
    esac
    
    log_info "Deployment operation completed successfully!"
}

# Run main function
main "$@"

#!/bin/bash
set -euo pipefail

# OVH Cloud Deployment Script for Manifolded
# Deploys the complete Manifolded platform to OVH Cloud infrastructure

SCRIPT_DIR="$( cd "$( dirname "${BASH_SOURCE[0]}" )" && pwd )"
PROJECT_ROOT="$(dirname "$SCRIPT_DIR")"

# Source environment variables
if [ -f "${PROJECT_ROOT}/.env" ]; then
    source "${PROJECT_ROOT}/.env"
fi

# OVH Configuration
OVH_REGION="${OVH_REGION:-BHS}"
OVH_DATACENTER="${OVH_DATACENTER:-bhs1}"
OVH_REGISTRY="${OVH_REGISTRY:-registry.ovh.net}"
REGISTRY_NAMESPACE="${REGISTRY_NAMESPACE:-manifolded}"

# Deployment Configuration
DEPLOYMENT_ENV="${DEPLOYMENT_ENV:-production}"
NOMAD_ADDR="${NOMAD_ADDR:-https://nomad.manifolded.ovh:4646}"
CONSUL_ADDR="${CONSUL_ADDR:-https://consul.manifolded.ovh:8500}"
VAULT_ADDR="${VAULT_ADDR:-https://vault.manifolded.ovh:8200}"

# Load registry configuration
if [ -f "${PROJECT_ROOT}/.env.registry" ]; then
    source "${PROJECT_ROOT}/.env.registry"
fi

# Container images - Production Split Architecture
# Private images (OVH Registry)
CORE_PRIVATE_IMAGE="${OVH_REGISTRY}/${MANIFOLD_NAMESPACE:-manifolded}/core:${VERSION:-latest}"
SECURITY_IMAGE="${OVH_REGISTRY}/${MANIFOLD_NAMESPACE:-manifolded}/security:${VERSION:-latest}"
SANDBOX_IMAGE="${OVH_REGISTRY}/${MANIFOLD_NAMESPACE:-manifolded}/sandbox:${VERSION:-latest}"
VIMMACS_RUNTIME_IMAGE="${OVH_REGISTRY}/${VIMMACS_NAMESPACE:-vimmacs}/runtime:${VERSION:-latest}"

# Public images (Docker Hub)
CLI_PUBLIC_IMAGE="${PUBLIC_REGISTRY:-docker.io}/${PUBLIC_NAMESPACE:-manifolded}/cli:${VERSION:-latest}"
SDK_IMAGE="${PUBLIC_REGISTRY:-docker.io}/${PUBLIC_NAMESPACE:-manifolded}/sdk:${VERSION:-latest}"
EXAMPLES_IMAGE="${PUBLIC_REGISTRY:-docker.io}/${PUBLIC_NAMESPACE:-manifolded}/examples:${VERSION:-latest}"

# Colors
RED='\033[0;31m'
GREEN='\033[0;32m'
YELLOW='\033[1;33m'
BLUE='\033[0;34m'
NC='\033[0m'

log_info() { echo -e "${GREEN}[INFO]${NC} $1"; }
log_warn() { echo -e "${YELLOW}[WARN]${NC} $1"; }
log_error() { echo -e "${RED}[ERROR]${NC} $1"; }
log_debug() { echo -e "${BLUE}[DEBUG]${NC} $1"; }

# Check prerequisites
check_prerequisites() {
    log_info "Checking deployment prerequisites..."
    
    # Check required tools
    local required_tools=("python3" "nomad" "consul" "vault" "jq" "curl")
    for tool in "${required_tools[@]}"; do
        if ! command -v "$tool" &> /dev/null; then
            log_error "$tool is not installed"
            exit 1
        fi
    done
    
    # Check OVH credentials
    if [ -z "${OVH_APPLICATION_KEY}" ] || [ -z "${OVH_APPLICATION_SECRET}" ] || [ -z "${OVH_CONSUMER_KEY}" ]; then
        log_error "OVH credentials not set. Please export OVH_APPLICATION_KEY, OVH_APPLICATION_SECRET, and OVH_CONSUMER_KEY"
        exit 1
    fi
    
    # Check Nomad connectivity
    if ! nomad status &> /dev/null; then
        log_warn "Cannot connect to Nomad cluster at ${NOMAD_ADDR}"
        log_warn "Attempting to set up Nomad connection..."
        export NOMAD_ADDR="${NOMAD_ADDR}"
        export NOMAD_TOKEN="${NOMAD_TOKEN:-}"
    fi
    
    log_info "Prerequisites check completed"
}

# Deploy infrastructure using Python OVH client
deploy_infrastructure() {
    log_info "Deploying OVH infrastructure..."
    
    python3 "${PROJECT_ROOT}/scripts/ovh_deploy.py" \
        --action deploy \
        --region "${OVH_REGION}" \
        --environment "${DEPLOYMENT_ENV}" \
        --config "${PROJECT_ROOT}/configs/ovh-infrastructure.yaml" || {
        log_error "Infrastructure deployment failed"
        exit 1
    }
    
    log_info "Infrastructure deployed successfully"
}

# Setup HashiCorp Vault for secrets management
setup_vault() {
    log_info "Setting up Vault for secrets management..."
    
    # Initialize Vault if needed
    if ! vault status &> /dev/null; then
        log_info "Initializing Vault..."
        vault operator init -key-shares=5 -key-threshold=3 > "${PROJECT_ROOT}/.vault-keys"
        chmod 600 "${PROJECT_ROOT}/.vault-keys"
        log_warn "Vault keys saved to ${PROJECT_ROOT}/.vault-keys - KEEP THESE SECURE!"
    fi
    
    # Create secrets for production-split architecture
    vault kv put secret/manifolded/production \
        database_url="${DATABASE_URL}" \
        redis_url="${REDIS_URL}" \
        s3_bucket="${S3_BUCKET}" \
        phoenix_secret="${PHOENIX_SECRET_KEY_BASE}" \
        wasm_signing_key="${WASM_SIGNING_KEY}"
    
    # Registry credentials for private and public repositories
    vault kv put secret/manifolded/registry \
        ovh_registry_username="${OVH_REGISTRY_USERNAME}" \
        ovh_registry_password="${OVH_REGISTRY_PASSWORD}" \
        dockerhub_username="${DOCKERHUB_USERNAME:-}" \
        dockerhub_token="${DOCKERHUB_TOKEN:-}"
    
    # Security and sandboxing configuration
    vault kv put secret/manifolded/security \
        sandbox_layers=8 \
        isolation_level="maximum" \
        kata_enabled="true" \
        quantum_wasm_enabled="true" \
        air_gap_enabled="true"
    
    # Create policies for production-split architecture
    vault policy write manifolded-core - <<EOF
path "secret/data/manifolded/production" {
  capabilities = ["read", "list"]
}
path "secret/data/manifolded/registry" {
  capabilities = ["read", "list"]
}
path "secret/data/manifolded/security" {
  capabilities = ["read", "list"]
}
path "auth/token/renew-self" {
  capabilities = ["update"]
}
EOF
    
    # Additional policy for Vimmacs runtime
    vault policy write vimmacs-runtime - <<EOF
path "secret/data/manifolded/registry" {
  capabilities = ["read"]
}
path "secret/data/manifolded/security" {
  capabilities = ["read"]
}
path "auth/token/renew-self" {
  capabilities = ["update"]
}
EOF
    
    log_info "Vault setup completed"
}

# Setup Consul for service discovery
setup_consul() {
    log_info "Setting up Consul service discovery..."
    
    # Register services for production-split architecture
    consul services register - <<EOF
{
  "service": {
    "name": "manifolded-core",
    "tags": ["production", "api", "grpc", "8-layer-sandbox"],
    "port": 50051,
    "check": {
      "grpc": "localhost:50051",
      "interval": "10s"
    }
  }
}
EOF
    
    consul services register - <<EOF
{
  "service": {
    "name": "vimmacs-runtime",
    "tags": ["production", "wasm", "archlinux", "kata"],
    "port": 50052,
    "check": {
      "grpc": "localhost:50052",
      "interval": "15s"
    }
  }
}
EOF
    
    consul services register - <<EOF
{
  "service": {
    "name": "manifolded-security",
    "tags": ["production", "security", "scanner"],
    "port": 8443,
    "check": {
      "https": "https://localhost:8443/health",
      "interval": "30s"
    }
  }
}
EOF
    
    consul services register - <<EOF
{
  "service": {
    "name": "manifolded-phoenix",
    "tags": ["production", "web", "hpqc", "quantum"],
    "port": 4000,
    "check": {
      "http": "http://localhost:4000/health",
      "interval": "10s"
    }
  }
}
EOF
    
    # Set configuration
    consul kv put manifolded/config/production @"${PROJECT_ROOT}/configs/production.yaml"
    
    log_info "Consul setup completed"
}

# Deploy using Nomad
deploy_nomad() {
    log_info "Deploying to Nomad cluster..."
    
    # Validate job file
    nomad job validate "${PROJECT_ROOT}/nomad/manifolded.nomad" || {
        log_error "Nomad job validation failed"
        exit 1
    }
    
    # Plan deployment with production-split images
    log_info "Planning Nomad deployment with production-split architecture..."
    nomad job plan \
        -var="image_core=${CORE_PRIVATE_IMAGE}" \
        -var="image_security=${SECURITY_IMAGE}" \
        -var="image_sandbox=${SANDBOX_IMAGE}" \
        -var="image_vimmacs=${VIMMACS_RUNTIME_IMAGE}" \
        -var="image_cli=${CLI_PUBLIC_IMAGE}" \
        -var="datacenter=${OVH_DATACENTER}" \
        -var="environment=${DEPLOYMENT_ENV}" \
        -var="registry_ovh=${OVH_REGISTRY}" \
        -var="registry_public=${PUBLIC_REGISTRY:-docker.io}" \
        "${PROJECT_ROOT}/nomad/manifolded.nomad"
    
    # Run deployment
    log_info "Running Nomad deployment with 8-layer sandboxing..."
    nomad job run \
        -var="image_core=${CORE_PRIVATE_IMAGE}" \
        -var="image_security=${SECURITY_IMAGE}" \
        -var="image_sandbox=${SANDBOX_IMAGE}" \
        -var="image_vimmacs=${VIMMACS_RUNTIME_IMAGE}" \
        -var="image_cli=${CLI_PUBLIC_IMAGE}" \
        -var="datacenter=${OVH_DATACENTER}" \
        -var="environment=${DEPLOYMENT_ENV}" \
        -var="registry_ovh=${OVH_REGISTRY}" \
        -var="registry_public=${PUBLIC_REGISTRY:-docker.io}" \
        -check-index 0 \
        "${PROJECT_ROOT}/nomad/manifolded.nomad" || {
        log_error "Nomad deployment failed"
        exit 1
    }
    
    # Wait for deployment to be healthy
    log_info "Waiting for deployment to be healthy..."
    local max_attempts=60
    local attempt=0
    
    while [ $attempt -lt $max_attempts ]; do
        if nomad job status manifolded | grep -q "running.*healthy"; then
            log_info "Deployment is healthy"
            break
        fi
        sleep 5
        ((attempt++))
    done
    
    if [ $attempt -eq $max_attempts ]; then
        log_error "Deployment health check timed out"
        exit 1
    fi
    
    log_info "Nomad deployment completed successfully"
}

# Setup monitoring and alerting
setup_monitoring() {
    log_info "Setting up monitoring and alerting..."
    
    # Deploy Prometheus configuration
    consul kv put prometheus/config/manifolded @"${PROJECT_ROOT}/monitoring/prometheus/manifolded-prometheus.yml"
    
    # Deploy Grafana dashboards
    for dashboard in "${PROJECT_ROOT}"/monitoring/grafana/dashboards/*.json; do
        dashboard_name=$(basename "$dashboard" .json)
        consul kv put "grafana/dashboards/${dashboard_name}" @"${dashboard}"
    done
    
    # Setup alerts
    consul kv put alertmanager/config/manifolded @"${PROJECT_ROOT}/monitoring/alertmanager/alertmanager.yml"
    
    log_info "Monitoring setup completed"
}

# Configure load balancer and SSL
setup_load_balancer() {
    log_info "Configuring load balancer and SSL..."
    
    # Use OVH API to configure load balancer
    python3 - <<EOF
import ovh
import os

client = ovh.Client(
    endpoint='ovh-eu',
    application_key=os.environ['OVH_APPLICATION_KEY'],
    application_secret=os.environ['OVH_APPLICATION_SECRET'],
    consumer_key=os.environ['OVH_CONSUMER_KEY']
)

# Configure load balancer
service_name = os.environ['OVH_SERVICE_NAME']
lb_id = os.environ.get('OVH_LOAD_BALANCER_ID')

if lb_id:
    # Add backend servers
    backend_config = {
        'displayName': 'manifolded-production',
        'port': 8080,
        'probe': {
            'url': '/health',
            'interval': 30,
            'method': 'GET'
        }
    }
    
    result = client.post(f'/ipLoadbalancing/{lb_id}/tcp/backend', **backend_config)
    print(f"Load balancer configured: {result}")
EOF
    
    # Setup SSL certificate
    if [ -n "${DOMAIN_NAME}" ]; then
        log_info "Setting up SSL for ${DOMAIN_NAME}..."
        # This would typically use Let's Encrypt or OVH SSL
    fi
    
    log_info "Load balancer setup completed"
}

# Run smoke tests
run_smoke_tests() {
    log_info "Running smoke tests..."
    
    # Test core API
    if curl -f -s "http://${NOMAD_ADDR}/v1/agent/health" > /dev/null; then
        log_info "âœ“ Nomad API is healthy"
    else
        log_error "âœ— Nomad API is not responding"
    fi
    
    # Test Manifolded core (8-layer sandboxing)
    local core_endpoint=$(consul catalog service manifolded-core -format=json 2>/dev/null | jq -r '.[0].ServiceAddress' || echo "")
    if [ -n "$core_endpoint" ] && [ "$core_endpoint" != "null" ]; then
        if grpcurl -plaintext "${core_endpoint}:50051" health.Health/Check &> /dev/null; then
            log_info "âœ“ Manifolded Core (8-layer sandbox) is healthy"
        else
            log_error "âœ— Manifolded Core is not responding on gRPC"
        fi
    fi
    
    # Test Vimmacs WebAssembly runtime
    local vimmacs_endpoint=$(consul catalog service vimmacs-runtime -format=json 2>/dev/null | jq -r '.[0].ServiceAddress' || echo "")
    if [ -n "$vimmacs_endpoint" ] && [ "$vimmacs_endpoint" != "null" ]; then
        if grpcurl -plaintext "${vimmacs_endpoint}:50052" health.Health/Check &> /dev/null; then
            log_info "âœ“ Vimmacs WebAssembly Runtime is healthy"
        else
            log_warn "âœ— Vimmacs Runtime is not responding on gRPC"
        fi
    fi
    
    # Test Security services
    local security_endpoint=$(consul catalog service manifolded-security -format=json 2>/dev/null | jq -r '.[0].ServiceAddress' || echo "")
    if [ -n "$security_endpoint" ] && [ "$security_endpoint" != "null" ]; then
        if curl -k -f -s "https://${security_endpoint}:8443/health" > /dev/null; then
            log_info "âœ“ Manifolded Security Scanner is healthy"
        else
            log_warn "âœ— Security Scanner is not responding"
        fi
    fi
    
    # Test Phoenix/HPQC endpoint
    local phoenix_endpoint=$(consul catalog service manifolded-phoenix -format=json 2>/dev/null | jq -r '.[0].ServiceAddress' || echo "")
    if [ -n "$phoenix_endpoint" ] && [ "$phoenix_endpoint" != "null" ]; then
        if curl -f -s "http://${phoenix_endpoint}:4000/health" > /dev/null; then
            log_info "âœ“ Phoenix/HPQC (Quantum Computing) is healthy"
        else
            log_warn "âœ— Phoenix/HPQC is not responding"
        fi
    fi
    
    log_info "Smoke tests completed"
}

# Print deployment summary
print_summary() {
    echo
    echo "============================================================"
    echo "         Manifolded Production-Split Deployment"
    echo "============================================================"
    echo "Environment:        ${DEPLOYMENT_ENV}"
    echo "Region:            ${OVH_REGION}"
    echo "Datacenter:        ${OVH_DATACENTER}"
    echo "Architecture:      Production-Split (Private/Public)"
    echo "Sandboxing:        8-Layer Maximum Security"
    echo
    echo "Services:"
    echo "  Nomad:           ${NOMAD_ADDR}"
    echo "  Consul:          ${CONSUL_ADDR}"
    echo "  Vault:           ${VAULT_ADDR}"
    echo
    echo "Private Images (OVH Registry):"
    echo "  Core:            ${CORE_PRIVATE_IMAGE}"
    echo "  Security:        ${SECURITY_IMAGE}"
    echo "  Sandbox:         ${SANDBOX_IMAGE}"
    echo "  Vimmacs Runtime: ${VIMMACS_RUNTIME_IMAGE}"
    echo
    echo "Public Images (Docker Hub):"
    echo "  CLI:             ${CLI_PUBLIC_IMAGE}"
    echo "  SDK:             ${SDK_IMAGE}"
    echo "  Examples:        ${EXAMPLES_IMAGE}"
    echo
    echo "Endpoints:"
    
    # Get service endpoints from Consul
    if command -v consul &> /dev/null; then
        local core_addr=$(consul catalog service manifolded-core -format=json 2>/dev/null | jq -r '.[0].ServiceAddress' || echo "N/A")
        local vimmacs_addr=$(consul catalog service vimmacs-runtime -format=json 2>/dev/null | jq -r '.[0].ServiceAddress' || echo "N/A")
        local security_addr=$(consul catalog service manifolded-security -format=json 2>/dev/null | jq -r '.[0].ServiceAddress' || echo "N/A")
        local phoenix_addr=$(consul catalog service manifolded-phoenix -format=json 2>/dev/null | jq -r '.[0].ServiceAddress' || echo "N/A")
        echo "  Core gRPC:       ${core_addr}:50051"
        echo "  Vimmacs WASM:    ${vimmacs_addr}:50052"
        echo "  Security HTTPS:  ${security_addr}:8443"
        echo "  Phoenix/HPQC:    ${phoenix_addr}:4000"
    fi
    
    echo
    echo "Next Steps:"
    echo "  1. Verify deployment: nomad job status manifolded"
    echo "  2. Check logs: nomad alloc logs <alloc-id>"
    echo "  3. Access UI: http://<load-balancer-ip>"
    echo "  4. Test CLI: manifolded --endpoint grpc://<core-ip>:50051 status"
    echo "============================================================"
}

# Main deployment flow
main() {
    log_info "Starting Manifolded deployment to OVH Cloud..."
    
    # Parse arguments
    ACTION="${1:-deploy}"
    
    case "$ACTION" in
        deploy)
            check_prerequisites
            deploy_infrastructure
            setup_vault
            setup_consul
            deploy_nomad
            setup_monitoring
            setup_load_balancer
            run_smoke_tests
            print_summary
            ;;
        update)
            check_prerequisites
            deploy_nomad
            run_smoke_tests
            ;;
        rollback)
            log_info "Rolling back deployment..."
            nomad job revert manifolded 1
            ;;
        status)
            nomad job status manifolded
            consul catalog services
            ;;
        destroy)
            log_warn "Destroying deployment..."
            read -p "Are you sure? (yes/no): " confirm
            if [ "$confirm" = "yes" ]; then
                nomad job stop -purge manifolded
                python3 "${PROJECT_ROOT}/scripts/ovh_deploy.py" --action destroy
            fi
            ;;
        *)
            echo "Usage: $0 [deploy|update|rollback|status|destroy]"
            exit 1
            ;;
    esac
    
    log_info "Deployment operation completed successfully!"
}

# Run main function
main "$@"
